item.title: Astral Mead
item.fluff: This sweet sparkling beverage infuses and restores your body

block.name: Property
block.line: A single flask of astral mead weights half a pound.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You do not need to eat or drink for a day.
You also gain a +3 power bonus to Endurance checks, and regain an extra 2 hit points whenever you spend a healing surge to regain hit points.

item.title: Burning Bronze Rye
item.fluff: The smell of this spirit is enough to water your eyes and chase away any cold feelings in your extremities

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 5 cold and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls with Fire powers.
Level 18: Resist 10 cold, and a +4 power bonus.
Level 28: Resist 15 cold, and a +6 power bonus.
The first time you spend an action point before the end of the encounter, you regain 5 hit points.
Level 18: 10 hit points.
Level 28: 20 hit points.

item.title: Cask of Liquid Gold
item.fluff: This cask contains a never-ending supply of dwarven ale

block.name: Property
block.line: At the start of each day, the cask fills to its full volume with dwarven ale.
Any ale taken from the cask evaporates if it has not been consumed when the cask refills.

item.title: Cryptspawn Potion
item.fluff: Drinking this viscous fluid that smells of decay provides protection against powers of creatures that live beyond the grave by making you similar to one

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You spend a healing surge to become desiccated until the end of the encounter.
While desiccated, you have resist 5 necrotic, 5 poison.
Level 15: Resist 10 necrotic, 10 poison.
Level 25: Resist 15 necrotic, 15 poison.
Also, if you make Endurance checks against a disease of the potion's level or lower during your next extended rest, you gain a +5 power bonus to the first check.

item.title: Elixir of Dragon Breath
item.fluff: Whether frigid, acidic, or crackling with energy, this liquid grants you a poten blast of dragon breath

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You spend a healing surge to be able to use the following attack action at-will until the end of the encounter:
Standard Action: Attack: Close blast 3 (each creature in the blast); Item's level +3 vs. Reflex
Hit: 2d6 + your Constitution modifier damage.
Level 17: 3d6 + your Constitution modifier damage.
Level 27: 4d6 + your Constitution modifier damage.
When this elixir is created, the creator chooses acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The attack deals the chosen type of damage, and the power and attack have the corresponding keyword.

Special: If you have the dragon breath racial power, you can choose to make the attack granted by this elixir deal damage of the same type as your dragon breath and have the coresponding keyword. You make this decision when you drink the elixir.

item.title: Elixir of Fortitude
item.fluff: Your body is ready to grow tougher after imbibing this viscous fuchsia liquid

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You can use the following action once before the end of the encounter:
Free Interrupt: Trigger: An attack hits your Fortitude defense; Your Fortitude defense becomes 25 against the triggering attack.
Level 13: Becomes 30.
Level 18: Becomes 35.
Level 23: Becomes 40.
Level 28: Becomes 45.

item.title: Elixir of Reflexes
item.fluff: You become ready to act quicker after imbibing this thin rose liquid

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You can use the following action once before the end of the encounter:
Free Interrupt: Trigger: An attack hits your Reflex defense; Your Reflex defense becomes 25 against the triggering attack.
Level 13: Becomes 30.
Level 18: Becomes 35.
Level 23: Becomes 40.
Level 28: Becomes 45.

item.title: Elixir of Speed
item.fluff: This sapphire brew crackles with energy and increases your speed

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to speed for 1 hour.

item.title: Elixir of Water Breathing
item.fluff: The shortness of breath you feel when quaffing this potion is offset by its ability to allow you to breathe easily under water

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You can breath underwater for 1 hour.
Level 18: For 24 hours.

item.title: Elixir of Will
item.fluff: Your mind becomes ready to be more resilient after imbibing this bubbling white liquid

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You can use the following action once before the end of the encounter:
Free Interrupt: Trigger: An attack hits your Will defense; Your Will defense becomes 25 against the triggering attack.
Level 13: Becomes 30.
Level 18: Becomes 35.
Level 23: Becomes 40.
Level 28: Becomes 45.

item.title: Eternal Flask of Dragon Fire
item.fluff: This magic flask produces one dose of a fiery elixir each day

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You drink the elixir from the flask, and can use the Dragon Breath attack once before the end of the encounter.
You have resist 5 fire until you use the attack or until the end of the encounter, whichever comes first.

block.name: Dragon Breath
block.line: Attack: Close blast 3 (each creature in the blast); Item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d6 + your Constitution modifier fire damage.
Level 13: 2d6 + your Constitution modifier fire damage.
Level 23: 3d6 + your Constitution modifier fire damage.

item.title: Potion of Cure Wounds
item.fluff: This potion covers your wounds and bruises in a silver light, causing them to mend

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You drink the potion.
<u>If you have at least one healing surge:</u> you must spend one to regain 1d8+5 hit points.
Level 11: 2d8+10 hit points.
Level 21: 3d8+20 hit points.
<u>If you are bloodied and don't have any healing surges:</u> you regain the above amount of hit points.
<u>If neither of the above things is true:</u> there is no effect.

item.title: Potion of Eladrin Shape
item.fluff: A crystal vial contains a milky green liquid that smells simultaneously of hot iron and pine forest - the sharp tang of its flavor leads to the power to take on another form

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Your appearance is altered through an illusion, causing you to appear as an eladrin of your gender for 1 hour. You can dismiss the illusion as a free action on your turn.
Level 7: 24 hours.
Level 12: A week.
Level 17: A month.
Level 22: A year and a day.

Your eladrin guise is not of any particular eladrin, and it shares some of your general features. Thus, if your nose is particularly long or wide for a member of your race, your guise has an eladrin nose of greater size as well.
If you have a particularly distinctive feature, such as a facial scar or discolored eye, this too is revealed in your eladrin guise.
You retain your attire, mannerisms, voice, and speech patterns.
You gain a +5 power bonus to Bluff checks to pass yourself as the creature you appear as, although the bonus is reduced to +2 if you must speak.

item.title: Potion of Feyspeak
item.fluff: This golden liquid looks like honey, but the gift it gives is far sweeter

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: For the next 5 minutes, you can speak with and be understood by any fey beast. This does not guarantee that it will be friendly, and some fey beasts might not have much to talk about.
Level 13: For the next hour.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: For the next hour, you can speak with and be understood by any fey beasts and you speak, read and write Sylvan. You also gain a +2 power bonus to Bluff checks, Diplomacy checks, and Intimidate checks against fey beasts.
Level 13: For the next 8 hours, and a +4 power bonus.

item.title: Potion of Protection from Evil
item.fluff: The pearly white liquid of this potion leaves you with a feeling of righteous zeal against those who would do evil

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against attacks by evil creatures.
Special: This potion has no effect if your level is higher than the item's level +5.

item.title: Potion of Recovery
item.fluff: This potion covers your most grievous wounds in brilliant silver light, restoring your body

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You drink the potion.
<u>If you have at least one healing surge:</u> you must spend one to regain 4d8+30 hit points.
<u>If you are bloodied and don't have any healing surges:</u> you regain the above amount of hit points.
<u>If neither of the above things is true:</u> You regain no hit points.
In addition, you can make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end.
